docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
default : OrderedPair|Vector
    Input to use as the x-axis for the random samples.
docstring.short_description: Generate an OrderedPair of random numbers, depending on the distribution selected and the input data.

parameters.name: distribution
parameters.description: the distribution over the random samples

parameters.name: lower_bound
parameters.description: the lower bound of the output interval

parameters.name: upper_bound
parameters.description: the upper bound of the output interval

parameters.name: normal_mean
parameters.description: the mean or "center" of the normal distribution

parameters.name: normal_standard_deviation
parameters.description: the spread or "width" of the normal distribution

parameters.name: poisson_events
parameters.description: the expected number of events occurring in a fixed time-interval when distribution is poisson

returns.description:
x: provided from input data
y: the random samples
